bibl.title: The Quality of the Recently Manufactured Papyrus as Compared with Ancient Egyptian Papyrus.
bibl.note: Presents the Ragabs' non-chemical method of papyrus making.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II

bibl.seg: Ragab Hassan, The Quality of the Recently Manufactured Papyrus as Compared with Ancient Egyptian Papyrus.
